name: Sonic Automotive, Inc.
description: Sonic Automotive, Inc. is one of the largest automotive retailers in the United States, specializing in both new and used vehicle sales, as well as automotive service and parts. Founded in 1997 by O. Bruton Smith, Sonic Automotive operates a network of dealerships across the country, representing numerous prestigious automotive brands. The company is committed to providing an exceptional customer experience, leveraging innovative technology and an extensive inventory to meet the diverse needs of car buyers. Sonic Automotive's operations are not limited to vehicle sales; the company also offers financing options and a comprehensive suite of automotive services, including repairs and maintenance. In addition, Sonic has embraced digital retailing, allowing customers to purchase vehicles online, enhancing convenience and accessibility. With a focus on transparency and customer satisfaction, Sonic Automotive strives to build lasting relationships with its clientele while continuously expanding its market presence. Through strategic acquisitions and a commitment to operational excellence, Sonic Automotive aims to be a leader in the evolving automotive retail landscape.

faq.answer: Sonic Automotive sells a variety of new and used vehicles, including luxury cars, trucks, and SUVs.
